posts.post_content:
I have Tobacco card size toploaders w/sleeves (10 per pk) and tobacco size recessed screwdowns.  I sell these on Ebay for $1.75 each and $2 for the first pack plus a $1 for each after because of weight.

I will sell these here for $1.55 per pack and the same on shipping except eack additional pk is $.75

Screwdowns are $10.50 for a pack (5 per pk).  shipping included

The BCW toploading card holders are known as the most popular rigid individual card holder in the collectible card industry. BCW Card Sleeves are an acid free, archival quality product made of crystal clear polypropylene.

The PVC used in BCW Toploads contain no plasticizers or stearates. Our high impact grade PVC does not migrate and will not harm your cards, photos or prints, while offering maximum protection and visual appeal.

- Perfect for mini cards like  T205,  T206, T208, T213, Allen and Ginter, Old Judge, M101-4, M101-5, E91, E90-1, E90-2, E90-3, E106, T216, D303, D304, E92, E104-1, E104-2, E104-3, N172, N184, N175, N162, E223 E98, E101, E102, E107, and more.

- Combo Pack of 10 Soft Sleeves & 10 Top Loads

- Crystal clear

- Made of high impact 12 mil rigid PVC

- Protect cards while handling

- Fits Cards 1 15/32 x 2 11/16

You can now take them out of those oversized cases that move around and put them into a toploader designed for tobacco cards.




Now offering tobacco binder pages by BCW.  They are 20 ct pages (5 more per pg than PROMOLD)  2000ct per box.  Sold in whole boxes only.  They are $18 shipped..

I would like to get 10 packs of toploaders and 2 packs of screwdowns.  Please e-mail me at [url]jrths07@yahoo.com[/url]  Thanks!
Jim

I would like to get 20 packs of toploaders. Please e-mail me at [url]grandslamcardcria@qwestoffice.net[/url] Thanks!
Mike
mike product shipped this morning.  Enjoy:)
